i,	hes	begey	bi_i	a_																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																					#1146																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																												m																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																														COP					S																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																												np-3																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																																												village
